text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with rocket beans rocket is another
name for arugula which is normally a
lettuce but i love to use it as an herb
and we're gonna do that in this
delicious bean side dish here and you
know a recipe is gonna be good when it
starts off with a little bit of olive
oil and some sliced bacon we're gonna
crisp that up while it's cooking on
medium i'm gonna take a big handful of
arugula also known as rocket as i said
and you gotta admit rocket so much more
cool than a man arugula by the way and
some supermarkets actually sell arugula
in those little plastic herb packages
and it's such a ripoff because it's like
you know three dollars for two leaves
where you can go to the lettuce aisle
and get a whole bag of arugula for the
same price so don't buy it in the herb
section buy it in the lettuce section
when the bacon is pretty much crisp
we're gonna add butter beans that's like
a fifteen ounce jar or I love the butter
bean makes a great side dish
now the bacon fat you notice I didn't
drain it that's the sauce that's right
that's the sauce so I think of this is
like a bacon dressing it's it's not bad
for you trust me everything in
moderation so we're gonna toss the beans
in the bacon and the bacon fat we're
gonna hit it with some freshly ground
black pepper a nice big pinch of salt
and we're gonna cook that for about
three minutes and then we're gonna add a
couple cloves of minced garlic I'll give
that a toss and you know the drill when
you add the garlic you can't cook it too
much longer cuz the garlic will burn and
get bitter all this is on medium heat by
the way and as soon as that garlic gets
swirled around for about thirty seconds
I'm going to add my rocket toss it
around and as soon as it wilts like that
turn off the heat that's right turn off
the heat
add the juice of half a lemon that's
going to counter the richness and the
bacon it's great combination with the
rocket and the beans and that is an
incredibly fast incredibly simple just
really satisfying homey rustic bean side
dish so you can call it arugula beans if
you want I'm gonna call it rocket beans
and that is so delicious serve next to
so many different things here's a little
sneak preview I served it next to some
maple brined pork loin that you're gonna
see in a video really delicious so
anyway if that a try all the ingredients
are on the site and as always enjoy
